name: puck_ability_orb_07
text: Did you mean to elude me?
text_simple: did you mean to elude me

name: puck_ally_01
text: Ah, Wisp, your mordant wit is wasted on these gross beings.
text_simple: ah wisp your mordant wit is wasted on these gross beings
pretty_criteria: Io is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: puck_ally_02
text: Excellent, an apparition of exceptional age. What I wonder can it teach me.
text_simple: excellent an apparition of exceptional age what i wonder can it teach me
pretty_criteria: Ancient Apparition is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: puck_ally_03
text: Rumor speaks of the Lone Druid as an ancient one, yet here I see barely a sprat.
text_simple: rumor speaks of the lone druid as an ancient one yet here i see barely a sprat
pretty_criteria: Lone Druid is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: puck_ally_04
text: What the Outworld represents, and why one would destroy it, is now a quandary that intrigues me.
text_simple: what the outworld represents and why one would destroy it is now a quandary that intrigues me
pretty_criteria: Outworld Devourer is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: puck_ally_05
text: To be a true enigma, it would be best to style oneself on something less studied than gravity.
text_simple: to be a true enigma it would be best to style oneself on something less studied than gravity
pretty_criteria: Enigma is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: puck_ally_06
text: From what primordial eon does the rock of Tiny hail?
text_simple: from what primordial eon does the rock of tiny hail
pretty_criteria: Tiny is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: puck_ally_07
text: Were you a bud of the Undertree? We could be no better companions.
text_simple: were you a bud of the undertree we could be no better companions

name: puck_battlebegins_01
text: I find myself strangely drawn to this odd configuration of activity.

text: I do enjoy an occasional blink.

text: An item of no small merit.

text: The worth of this gift is mine to plumb.

text: My pleasure at this finding fractures the lenses of the real.

text: A dark interval, and now a bright one.

name: puck_illus_02
text: Three can play at this game.

name: puck_illus_03
text: One Puck, two Puck, three Puck more!
text_simple: one puck two puck three puck more

name: puck_illus_04
text: One and one and one is three!
text_simple: one and one and one is three

name: puck_immort_02
text: Life can never be too long!
text_simple: life can never be too long

name: puck_invis_02
text: Regrettably, I remove myself from sight.
text_simple: regrettably i remove myself from sight

name: puck_kill_03
text: Will you not rise in my presence?
text_simple: will you not rise in my presence

name: puck_kill_08
text: You took that jape too far.

text: You might wish to retract your last move.

text: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!

name: puck_lose_04
text: The greatest tragedy of our eon.

name: puck_purch_02
text: I measure the cost in lives.
text_simple: i measure the cost in lives

name: puck_rare_01
text: The Scrolls of Haize are concise on this matter: with youth comes grave responsibility. A thousand years of youth have fallen behind, and still I fill the time with games.
text_simple: the scrolls of haize are concise on this matter with youth comes grave responsibility a thousand years of youth have fallen behind and still i fill the time with games

name: puck_rare_02
text: Hatched on a frond of the Undertree, I devoured leaf, stalk, root and all of my sibs. Yet, only halfway through this Eon, I already hunger for more!
text_simple: hatched on a frond of the undertree i devoured leaf stalk root and all of my sibs yet only halfway through this eon i already hunger for more

name: puck_regen_02
text: Why, this is as good as a continual molt!
text_simple: why this is as good as a continual molt

name: puck_respawn_02
text: That was an exceedingly odd metamorphosis.
text_simple: that was an exceedingly odd metamorphosis

name: puck_respawn_03
text: I had not expected to be reborn for another million years.
text_simple: i had not expected to be reborn for another million years

name: puck_respawn_04
text: Ah, nothing like the feel of a fresh molt.
text_simple: ah nothing like the feel of a fresh molt

name: puck_respawn_05
text: Someone chose a poor time to put me out of commission.
text_simple: someone chose a poor time to put me out of commission

name: puck_respawn_07
text: I return to the active world.
text_simple: i return to the active world

name: puck_rival_01
text: Green you may be, but I find you tiresome.
text_simple: green you may be but i find you tiresome

name: puck_rival_02
text: You are a sluggish creature, Slardar.
text_simple: you are a sluggish creature slardar

name: puck_rival_03
text: We two did sport, but in the end she tired.
text_simple: we two did sport but in the end she tired

name: puck_rival_04
text: What is this nature you speak of?
text_simple: what is this nature you speak of

name: puck_rival_05
text: Wisp, you are like a thought I once had but dismissed out of hand.
text_simple: wisp you are like a thought i once had but dismissed out of hand

name: puck_rival_06
text: I remember that one from some time long past.
text_simple: i remember that one from some time long past

name: puck_rival_07
text: That one admired my wings but could not be trusted to care for her own.
text_simple: that one admired my wings but could not be trusted to care for her own

name: puck_rival_08
text: It would seem that almost anything can call itself a dragon in this age.
text_simple: it would seem that almost anything can call itself a dragon in this age

name: puck_rival_09
text: If you are truly some sort of dragon, you must be a juvenile form.
text_simple: if you are truly some sort of dragon you must be a juvenile form

name: puck_rival_10
text: I sense this book of yours may be full of erroneous information.
text_simple: i sense this book of yours may be full of erroneous information

name: puck_rival_11
text: A poor specimen, not worthy of being mounted.
text_simple: a poor specimen not worthy of being mounted

name: puck_rival_12
text: I learned nothing from close observation of Tinker's demise.
text_simple: i learned nothing from close observation of tinkers demise

name: puck_rival_13
text: Again, Tinker's death yields no interesting conclusions.
text_simple: again tinkers death yields no interesting conclusions

name: puck_rival_15
text: Your comments cut me to the quick.
text_simple: your comments cut me to the quick

name: puck_rival_16
text: I have been to Claszureme. They still speak of their relief at being rid of you.
text_simple: i have been to claszureme they still speak of their relief at being rid of you

name: puck_rival_17
text: Wisp, I think you are too bold.
text_simple: wisp i think you are too bold

name: puck_rival_18
text: Wisp, I disagree with your alliance, yet you do make a compelling argument.
text_simple: wisp i disagree with your alliance yet you do make a compelling argument

name: puck_scepter_03
text: I wield this scepter with authority.
text_simple: i wield this scepter with authority

name: puck_spawn_02
text: In your tongue, I am known as Puck.
text_simple: in your tongue i am known as puck

name: puck_spawn_03
text: This might prove a sport of some interest.
text_simple: this might prove a sport of some interest

name: puck_spawn_05
text: What is this, a game of some sort?
text_simple: what is this a game of some sort

name: puck_spawn_06
text: A likely way to pass a fraction of an eon.
text_simple: a likely way to pass a fraction of an eon

name: puck_spawn_08
text: This should be less tiresome than another age in chrysalis.
text_simple: this should be less tiresome than another age in chrysalis

name: puck_win_04
text: I am unfamiliar with this feeling. Is it joy?
text_simple: i am unfamiliar with this feeling is it joy
